text: Happy Tree Friends is an American adult animated sitcom that was broadcast from September 25 to December 25, 2006 on G4 in the United States. It is a television version of the web cartoon series of the same name. ==Episodes== ==Notes== ==References== Category:2000s American animated television series Category:2006 American television series debuts Category:2006 American television series endings Category:Canadian animated television series Category:2006 Canadian television series debuts Category:2006 Canadian television series endings Category:English-language television programs Category:2000s American comedy television series
title: Happy Tree Friends (TV series)
